abstract: The Federal Aviation Administration ordered the temporary grounding of Boeing 787s operated by carriers in the United States. Here is the agency’s statement.
snippet: The Federal Aviation Administration ordered the temporary grounding of Boeing 787s operated by carriers in the United States. Here is the agency’s statement.
lead_paragraph: Following is the statement issued Wednesday evening by the Federal Aviation Administration ordering the temporary grounding of Boeing 787s operated by carriers in the United States:
